item.title: Belgium - Two-Day Trip to Bruges 2024/07/13
item.description: Day 1 We took a Flixbus from Eindhoven to Brussels and then a train to Bruges. For trains in Belgium, you need to buy a ticket, but for buses, you can just use a credit card to pay directly. Here are two detailed travel guides I found super helpful. However, the transportation here is quite simpleâ€”Google Maps will
